table.name: Overrun Fueling RPM Resume Threshold
table.description: This 2D table determines (on an ECT x axis) at what RPM the injectors switch back on from coasting (i.e. full lean, and injector pulse width at zero). This would be useful to those with much larger injectors than stock that have a problem with stalling out as the vehicle comes to stop / idle.

table.name: Overrun Enrich RPM Delta Activation
table.description: This table sets the required RPM delta for overrun enrichment to activate.

table.name: Overrun initial injector enrichment (pulsewidth)
table.description: This table sets the initial overrun enrichment when active.

table.name: Overrun Fueling Cut Counter RPM Threshold
table.description: These counters determine the RPM count before injectors cut off during overrun.
